Truth tables

  • These example truth tables can be revealed one column at a time, allowing a student to practice and check their work.
Equivalence
A B A ∨ ¬B  ¬ ( ¬A ∧ B )
T T T F T F F
T F T T T F F
F T F F F T T
F F T T T T F
Consequence
A B (¬A ∨ B) ∧ ¬B ¬A
T T F T F F F
T F F F F T F
F T T T F F T
F F T T T T T
